sentences.sContent: As mentioned at the beginning, as mentors we have met a great many companies and some very talented individuals.
sentences.sCn: 正如开始提到的，作为咨询师，我们遇见过很多公司和一些非常有才能的人。

sentences.sContent: I think that I learned a great many lessons from how I observed Mr Yokoi training his subordinates, and I think in my position I use some of them.
sentences.sCn: 我认为我从观察横井先生如何训练他的属下方面学到了很多，今天我在我的位置上还会用到其中的一些方法。

sentences.sContent: And in our travels to many clients, we have been fortunate to have met a great many talented and dedicated individuals.
sentences.sCn: 在我们和许多客户的交往中，我们有幸遇到了很多有才能的和有奉献精神的人。
